Title: Requires license plates for bicycles, bicycles for electric assist and electric scooters
Summary: Requires license plates for bicycles, bicycles with electric assist and electric scooters in New York city; requires a one time registration; requires a registration fee for such license plates.
LawCode: Amd Art 34 Art Head, add ยง1244, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to requiring license plates for bicycles, bicycles for electric assist and electric scooters
